title: Bangladeshi Blogger, Known As Free-Thinker, Violently Killed In Dhaka
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel speaks with Zafar Sobhan, editor of the English-language Dhaka Tribune, for more on the death of a Bangladeshi blogger who was murdered near his home in Dhaka, Bangladesh, Monday.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
